mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Barnes, Robert H.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Bellpree, Washington Co., O [Belpre, Washington County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Barnes, Robert H. Patient Age: 23. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of right arm conical bullet. Ball first entered the articulation of the maximal and middle phalanges of little finger of left hand. Same bullet entered the integument one inch below elbow joint anterior aspect passing out entering the anterior aspect of arm at the flexure of jointOn separate piece of paper: passing a little of [illegible] upwards through [illegible] of external condyle to exit above elbow joint . Location Wounded: Fisher's Hill, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/09/22. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Deserted 1865/01/03 on furlough.
